title.rendered: Value education for students of Kendriya Vidyalya, Jabalpur

content.rendered:
A value education workshop was conducted at Kendriya Vidyalya 2, GCF, in Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, under Smile Foundtaion’s Child for Child (CFC) programme.

Mr. Someshwar Nair from Smile Foundation conducted the workshop during the morning assembly, sensitizing more than 1000 students. Children from grade 1st to 10th attended the assembly.

Principal Mrs. Reena Chakravorty also inspired the children to grow up as good human beings and congratulated Smile Foundation for undertaking this special endeavour.
